subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After sentimental farewells of their own to Mariano Rivera and Andy Pettitte in recent days, the Yankees had no tears left as they beat the Astros to finish the season with an 85-77 record.
snippet: After sentimental farewells of their own to Mariano Rivera and Andy Pettitte in recent days, the Yankees had no tears left as they beat the Astros to finish the season with an 85-77 record.
